preqs: MGP1010 or MGF1010 or MGW1010 or MKB1010 or MGG1010

rules.ruleString: Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {MGP1010, MGW1010} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Must be enrolled in course type {10, 41, 50}

description: Do businesses and managers have any responsibilities beyond profit maximisation? To what extent should organisational activities be left to the operation of the free market and to what extent should they be regulated through internal and external mechanisms? This unit examines the theoretical foundations of the different answers that have been given to these fundamental questions.
